game_description: Join our Discord(https://discord.gg/tr4gh8Yt7N) to win a free try! Brave chess players, unsheathe your sword and commence a medieval duel on the chessboard! Immerse yourself in the medieval castle or the pixel-style arena to achieve multi-scene travel.Try to interact with pieces and personages, something interesting might occur. Of course, you can challenge our knights and heroes, the iron throne awaits the conqueror! Function Update 1. Hand Tracking 2. Avatar & Voice Chat Core Features - 8 AI levels - Online mode: Friend Room; Playing with mobile or vr opponents - 4 scenes: Medieval Castle & Pixel-style & Space & Japanese-style room - Review and analysis of chess moves - 1000+ puzzles - Fight animations and sound FX - Both Hand tracking and Touch controllers are supported! We will constantly optimize and update to bring you a better experience. Avatars, voice IP are on the way. Feel free to leave feedback in comments.
review_1: Just got this game so I could play with some of the CPU characters shown in the trailer. Nada, zilch, NOTHING shows up on the other side of the board in the Japan environment just the game pieces that move on their own. Gameplay is okay, so if you want basic chess, yes this offers that. Chess Club VR outshines this for better graphics and online play. The new update will not let me choose anything. Unable to play.
review_2: Game has yet to load for me. Just the neverending load screen
review_3: I just learned to play chess (only took 38 years) and now I’m addicted like none other. The 2 best parts of the game is that it’s very accurate hand tracking system and the puzzles.
review_4: For some reason I got this game for free anyone know why?
review_5: Game is nice but have you planned to add lichess / chess.com integration ?. It is so difficult to find good club players Update 10/12/22 7 millions of mobile players ?. No. Searching for an opponent and no seeking response And there are only 37 reviews so very very few players
